item.description:
Due to generous donation by a corporate sponsor, Meetup will organize this event for the world famous Museum of Fine Arts. In lieu of paying a $17 general admission price, we will charge each attendee a $3 Meetup fee for this event. Because there is a limited number of free ticket, only Meetup member can sign up for this event. If a member wants to bring a guest, I will encourage such guest to join our Meetup group and sign up for the event directly.

MFA is easily accessible on the green line. You can find further information on the museum by the following link.

http://www.mfa.org/vi...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Ticket desk at the Musuem Road Entrance

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Museum of Fine Arts
